description: It follows a crew of scientists on a research station as they attempt to understand an extraterrestrial intelligence, which takes the form of a vast ocean on the titular alien planet.

name: Tres Tristes Tigres
author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante
description: It is a highly experimental, Joycean novel, playful and rich in literary allusions.
